definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The people of Hamelin overwhelmed him with reproaches.
sentences.chinese: 哈默林鎮上的人將他罵得狗血噴頭。

sentences.english: Plus, he gave me a piece of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他還把我罵得狗血噴頭的。

sentences.english: Butcher Hu spat in his face, and poured out a torrent of abuse.
sentences.chinese: 范進被胡屠夫一口在臉上，罵了一個狗血噴頭。

sentences.english: The old woman rained down curses on our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那老婆子把我們罵得狗血噴頭。
